main event: Three UFO sightings were reported in Dayton, Ohio, with observations spanning different periods.
interesting points: Witnesses described a round object with a funny design descending in front of a car at driving height,Two separate instances involved a bright flare color with no sound observed over a period of 15 minutes,Some witnesses were reluctant to report sightings due to fear of being thought crazy,The sightings were part of a broader investigation involving 3,500 reports,450 of which were selected for further study,Several witnesses described psychological factors influencing their reporting.
sighted object: round object with a funny design
